plot: Juan works in a uniforms store. A safe, mundane life without ambition. Until one day, La Borrega came along.
title: Juan y la Borrega
plot_es: Juan works in a uniforms store. A safe, mundane life without ambition. Until one day, La Borrega came along.
plot_en: Juan works in a uniforms store. A safe, mundane life without ambition. Until one day, La Borrega came along.

produce.name: Consejo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes (CONACULTA)
